component.name: Datatable
component.overview:
jPlex's Datatable provides a fast and easy-to-use way to present a data set. You can bind your datable with all sources supported by our `DataSource` utility:
  • Raw JavaScript array
  • Function returning an array
  • Ajax call to a JSON file
  • Ajax call to a XML file
It also brings some classical features you may expect, such as:
  • Sort by columns, with support for custom sorters
  • Row formatting, Cell formatting (numbers, dates, currencies)
  • Row selection, including support for modifier keys

rls.name: Nightly
rls.feature: Bind to jPlex available `DataSource` (Arrays, Function, JSON or XML)
Row selection modes: none, single or multiple. Multiple mode supports modifier keys. Configuration parameter: `select`.
Rows sorting by column (asc/descending). Configuration ``sortedBy: { order: /*asc or desc*/, key: /*column key*/}`` gives the initial behavior.
Cell formatters for String (default), Numbers and Currencies (`Datatable.CellFormatter.*`)
Custom row formatting thanks to the `rowFormatter` configuration parameter.
Action for double-click on a row (custom event `onRowDoubleClickEvent`) and row selection (`onRowSelectionEvent`)
